attributes.title: The lack of credibility and unprofessionalism was astonishing
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. This app is straight propaganda and should not be something we should be circulating. This app promotes an era where this country treated a multiple group of people like animals. You guys should be ashamed. So unprofessional and shows what’s your true morals really are. So disgusting.

attributes.title: Robyn T
attributes.review: Like the ease of the app. Looking forward to watching more online events.

attributes.title: Amazing
attributes.review: This app is accurate and shows you all facts and is very helpful

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This is the worst app. I was on it and it started yelling racial slurs at me while a bunch of animated nazis were screaming through the screen. I was crying but I couldn’t un download this app. Donald trump then got to my number and started yelling at me calling me a ugly Jew. He wasn’t wrong but it still did hurt. This is a very bad app and needs to be removed

attributes.title: Gave me a virus!!!
attributes.review: Now we all know “Corona Virus” is just the loco liberals trying to rig the election, but the virus this app gave my phone is REAL. Trump 2020!! The virus broke my phone and I had to get it replaced. I don’t have apple care so it cost me nearly 1000$! Please be careful. I’m sure our lovely beautiful not racist president did not mean to break my phone. Trump 2020!🇵🇷

attributes.title: I HATE it here
attributes.review: This app is DIRTY and GHETTO to the MAX! I download it and all of the skin on my body immediately begins to burn from the amount of smelliness its feeling from this app. Had to delete it with a QUICKNESS. Had to begin praying to my very BLACK Lord and Savior Jesus Christ asking him to save me from this hatred🤢. if 2+2 is 4, and 5+5 is 10, this app is definitely for white supremacists🤗.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I got this app thinking nothing of it. As soon as I went on the app I saw an orange looking person. As soon as I saw the orange looking person, I knew my life would change dramatically, since that moment I have been scared for life and my life has been miserable. This is now one of the thousands of reasons I HATE trump.❤️😌

attributes.title: SERIOUS REVIEW
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app in hopes of finding a place to keep up with the news but i found only pictures and articles about pigs???
Very unprofessional and upsetting, pigs are beautiful creatures and comparing them to these political monsters is disrespectful.
How ever I will continue to call these “politicians” who make false promises piggies <3🧚🏼‍♀️✨

attributes.title: you tried it... don’t ever to it again✨🧚🏽
attributes.review: i actually had high hopes for this app. i was hoping to see a REAL president when i opened this app but instead racist AND a rapist 😔 i have enough emotional trauma to last me a life time because of this app, please don’t try it at home kids :/ also vote out cheeto puff 2020!!!

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: This app is horrendous. I have never seen a app this bad. I’ve always supported Trump but now i’ve realized that he’s racist and so disrespectful. This app just proves how bad of a person he is. My phone kept glitching and i think it has a bug now. Maybe a cockroach? Do not download this app. For america’s sake✨🧚😍
